isis.stitle: CF 500, CF 600 Brakes - Brake System - General Information - Brake System Description and Operation

svcproc.title: Brake System Description and Operation
svcproc.para: For brake booster information, refer to Power Brake Actuation.
The braking system is a front-to-rear split hydraulic system. For additional information, refer to Hydraulic Brake Actuation.
The front wheel brakes utilize a dual piston brake to caliper and disc brake system. For additional information, refer to Front Disc Brake.
The rear brakes utilize a dual piston brake caliper and disc brake system. For additional information, refer to Rear Disc Brake.
The vehicle is equipped with a cable-operated parking brake. For additional information, refer to Parking Brake and Actuation.
For anti-lock brake system information, refer to Antilock Control.
